EEA Faceted Inheritance

EEA Faceted Inheritance¶

An extension to be used within eea.facetednavigation in order to allow objects to inherit faceted configuration from another faceted navigable object. This way one can define a global faceted navigable folder and reuse this configuration for multiple heritors.

Source code¶

Latest source code in EEA svn:
https://svn.eionet.europa.eu/repositories/Zope/trunk/eea.faceted.inheritance/
